metadata.title: CVE-2019-6229 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue is fixedin iOS 12.1.3, tvOS 12.1.2, Safari 12.0.3, iTunes 12.9.3 for Windows,iCloud for Windows 7.10. Processing maliciously crafted web content maylead to universal cross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6229` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.5-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.5-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-5.0 - 2.22.5-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.5-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.5-1
gir1.2-webkit2-5.0 - 2.22.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-5.0-0 - 2.22.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-5.0-0 - 2.22.5-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.5-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
